name: Clawtivation
description:
Claw Household Goods to shop in the horrible new world. Game created during the Dogpit 2020 Jam! Try and get both endings (they will appear on the title screen.)

Controls

WASD or Arrow Keys move the claw. Space will open and close the claw arms. Move

as much items as you can into the glass drop zone to get points. If you get
enough points you're Clawtivation rank will go up.

Credits
  • Game: SysL - https://systemlogoff.com
  • Music: Nineveh - https://twitter.com/ninevehgames
  • Voice: Ashe Thurman - https://pixelsandpins.com/voice/
  • Sound Effect Bases: GDC Audio Packs - https://sonniss.com/gameaudiogdc
  • Font: RocknRoll One - https://fonts.google.com/specimen/RocknRoll+One
  • Household Goods: Ghostpixxells - https://ghostpixxells.itch.io/pixel-mart
